Hi, 

Thanks a lot for the guides. I managed to read the list of files 
contains in the ARC. I can read the html file as it is in plain text 
format but not with other format such as .jpg and .pdf.

How do I extract the jpg and pdf file?

Notice that reading each record is slow. Normally users will write 
java file using arcreader class to get all records in one time, am I 
right? Any other ways?

------------------------------------------------------------

Besides that, I was just using the basic setting that run the test. 
Whenever there are file formats other than plain text. Do I need to 
explicitly specify any setting?


Thanks,
Inn Fang
